metadata.description: Custom Claude Code skills and tools

plugins.name: auto-ralph
plugins.description: Proactively detects tasks suitable for Ralph Loop iteration. Auto-scores tasks, generates prompts, and executes with configurable iterations.

plugins.name: ultrathink-engine
plugins.description: Deep multi-perspective analysis. Use when user says ULTRATHINK, asks for brutal honesty, comprehensive analysis, or 'all points of view'.

plugins.name: orchestrator
plugins.description: Multi-agent orchestration with task decomposition, parallel execution, and smart agent routing. Commands: /orchestrate, /parallel, /plan-only
